node.title: Jesus: Wonderful, Counselor
node.description: In our fallen world are many broken people – broken in mind, body, and spirit. Though not all mental illness is the direct result of sin, or to be cured by the gospel, it is however true that apart from Christ we can never have the fullness of mental healing and strength He desires for us. It is God’s will for us to be of a sound mind! In this message Pastor Clark explores the characteristic of Jesus, who is described as the “Counselor” in Isaiah 9:6.
